definition: Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 人馬座|人马座[Ren2 ma3 zuo4]
to shoot/to launch/to allude to/radio- (chemistry)
old variant of 射[she4]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The Sagittarius' attitude to love drives Virgo out of his/her mind.
sentences.chinese: 射手座对于爱情的态度会让处女座发疯。

sentences.english: The freedom is necessary for Sagittarius .
sentences.chinese: 自由对于射手座来说是必须的。

sentences.english: This makes the Sagittarius woman intriguing as well as interesting.
sentences.chinese: 这让射手座的女人又迷人又有趣。

sentences.english: It's time to let your Sagittarius charm take over not your pushiness .
sentences.chinese: 是时候发挥妳射手座魅力了，不要一意孤行啊。

sentences.english: You don't like to take risks, and Sagittarians thrive on chance.
sentences.chinese: 你不喜欢冒险，偏偏这是射手座最钟意的。

sentences.english: The Fire signs is Aries, Leo and Sagittarius.
sentences.chinese: 火相星座有山羊座，狮子座和射手座。

sentences.english: N. Node is in 10 Degrees Sagittarius.
However, the Sagittarius woman is not the one who believes in flattery.
sentences.chinese: 但是，射手座的女人却不相信阿谀奉承这一套。

sentences.english: These are among those Sagittarius traits which make them stand apart.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是让射手座如此出众的特质之一。

sentences.english: But Sagittarius is born to love gambling, and they like to bet with others.
sentences.chinese: 然而射手座的人天性好赌，总喜欢跟人打赌。

sentences.english: One of the most prominent characteristics of a Sagittarius woman is her need for independence.
sentences.chinese: 射手座的女人最突出的特点莫过于她对独立的需求。

sentences.english: My star sign is Sagittarius and I was born in the year of the rooster.
sentences.chinese: 我的星座是射手座，在鸡年出生。

sentences.english: Enthusiastic and optimistic, Sagittarians need jobs that offer plenty of challenges.
sentences.chinese: 热情乐观的射手座享受能带来挑战的工作。

sentences.english: For Sagittarius it is most easily attracted by something from a foreign land.
sentences.chinese: 射手座最容易受到来自异邦事件的吸引。

sentences.english: Walking is a favourite Sagittarian pastime, and many excel at sports.
sentences.chinese: 射手座喜欢把走路当做消遣，而且大多精通体育运动。

definition: Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
constellation/astrological sign/CL:張|张[zhang1]
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Aries (star sign)

balance scale/Taiwan pr. [tian1 ping2]
